original: Ernberg, Erik Ludvig Emanuel, förste rådman, auditör, Kalmar, f. 4/9/03 i Sthlm av reg:rådet Jarl Ludvig E. o. Vilhelmina Maria Eleonore Riben. G. 40 m. ’skådespelerskan Magda Hclm. Barn: Jarl f. 42. — Stud:-ex. i S’thim 22, jur. kand. 30. Tingstjg. i Vililands doms. 30-32, tjg. i Svea hovr. fr. 33, e. fekal 34, sekr. i Solikntuna o. Färentuna 36, förordn. is. överkrigis-fiskal, vattenrättssekr., domh. ävensom boTgm., rådman el. asisesisor v. rådh :rätt. i Trosa, Västerås, Nyköp., Luleå o. Karlstad 33-38, förste rådman o. not. puW. i Kalmar fr. 38, auditör v. Kalm. flygfloltiilj fr. 42, tidv. förordn. s. krigsdom. 42-46. Led. i Kalmar av barnavind, suppl. i byggnrnd, v. ordf. i anb :dösh :komm.
translated: Ernberg, Erik Ludvig Emanuel, first councilman, auditor, Kalmar, born September 4, 1903 in Stockholm to the government counsellor Jarl Ludvig E. and Vilhelmina Maria Eleonore Riben. Married in 1940 to the actress Magda Hclm. Children: Jarl born in 1942. He passed his student examination in Stockholm in 1922, and obtained a degree in law in 1930. He served as a clerk in the Vililands court from 1930-1932, worked in the Svea Court of Appeal from 1933, and was appointed as an assistant prosecutor in 1934. He served as a secretary in Solikntuna and Färentuna in 1936, was appointed as a senior military prosecutor, water rights secretary, and judge as well as magistrate, councilman or assessor for the Trosa, Västerås, Nyköp., Luleå, and Karlstad courts between 1933-1938. From 1938, he served as the first councilman and notary public in Kalmar, and was an auditor for the Kalm. air fleet from 1942, and occasionally served as a military judge from 1942-1946. He was a member of the board of the Kalmar children's home, a substitute member of the building committee, and the vice chairman of the burial committee.
